column5: It was a tough fish on sat. excellent weather and the bay was calm... Lots of boats out but not many catching. we boated 3 here is my 27.5http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y11...0/000_0056.jpg
Samsquath Where were you fishing and how deep. We are comming up on Fri and can use any help we can get. It is our first time.will be at Merlins. Atlanta Dave
Dave... Do you know what cottage you'll be in yet? A bunch of us will be next door (sorta) at Tip of the Bay.

Bigfish We will be in one of their motel units. We will probably be over at tip of the bay for a few cool ones in the evening to meet up with some of you guys.Dwight Hottle is in our group I think he has talked with you. He sent me an email with your big eye pic a month or so ago.Hope to get a double didgit eye . Atlanta Dave
Dave I sent you a pm on another site. hope it helps. M
Here are a few more pics from Oct 23-25http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y11...00/quinte3.jpghttp://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y11...00/quinte1.jpg
Thoese are great fish hope we do as good. Thanks Atlanta Dave
There have been reports of some fish being caught east of the ferry in the deep water. Not the numbers of a month ago. All in all - fishing is tough. David Delcloo aka Superdad
